pr_title: fix query adjacent by filtering conditions with limit

timeline.author: houzhizhen

timeline.bodyText: add duplicate vertex in every loop?
timeline.author: houzhizhen

replies.bodyText: yes, to improve performance to avoid reading every time
replies.author: javeme

timeline.author: houzhizhen

replies.bodyText: 0 means none, and -1 means no limit
replies.author: javeme

replies.bodyText: It's better to add a limit(0) boundary test.
replies.author: houzhizhen

timeline.bodyText: if not use 0xff at all, prefer delete it and no need to assert
timeline.author: zhoney

replies.bodyText: to preserve the byte for future usages
replies.author: javeme

timeline.author: zhoney
zhoney
